{"faq": "## Privacy Policy – Updated FAQ

**Q1: How long will my data be stored?**
A: Under the new policy, personal data is retained for a maximum of 30 days unless you explicitly request longer storage for a specific feature.

**Q2: What new consent steps are required?**
A: When you create a new account or update your profile, you will be presented with a clear consent screen outlining what data is collected and why. You must actively tick the consent box to proceed.

**Q3: How can I delete my data?**
A: You can submit a deletion request at any time from the Settings → Privacy section. Once processed (typically within 48 hours), all personal data will be permanently removed.

**Q4: Does the company share my data with third parties?**
A: We only share data with vetted service providers that help us deliver the product, and only the minimum necessary information. All third‑party partners are contractually obligated to comply with GDPR/CCPA.

**Q5: Does this comply with GDPR and CCPA?**
A: Yes. The updated policy was reviewed by our legal team to ensure full compliance with European GDPR and California CCPA regulations.

**Q6: What happens to data collected before the policy change?**
A: Existing data will be handled according to the previous policy until it reaches its original retention limit, after which it will be deleted following the new 30‑day rule.

A: Please reach out to privacy@example.com for any questions or concerns regarding our privacy practices."}

arguments.faq_content:
## Privacy Policy – Updated FAQ

**Q1: How long will my data be stored?**
A: Under the new policy, personal data is retained for a maximum of 30 days unless you explicitly request longer storage for a specific feature.

**Q2: What new consent steps are required?**
A: When you create a new account or update your profile, you will be presented with a clear consent screen outlining what data is collected and why. You must actively tick the consent box to proceed.

**Q3: How can I delete my data?**
A: You can submit a deletion request at any time from the Settings → Privacy section. Once processed (typically within 48 hours), all personal data will be permanently removed.

**Q4: Does the company share my data with third parties?**
A: We only share data with vetted service providers that help us deliver the product, and only the minimum necessary information. All third‑party partners are contractually obligated to comply with GDPR/CCPA.

**Q5: Does this comply with GDPR and CCPA?**
A: Yes. The updated policy was reviewed by our legal team to ensure full compliance with European GDPR and California CCPA regulations.

**Q6: What happens to data collected before the policy change?**
A: Existing data will be handled according to the previous policy until it reaches its original retention limit, after which it will be deleted following the new 30‑day rule.

**Q7: Who can I contact for privacy questions?**
A: Please reach out to privacy@example.com for any questions or concerns regarding our privacy practices.
